subject: Brake pedal.
description_text:
My brake pedal is working for a couple pumps, then slowly increases to 100%
on its own, without touching?

conversations.body_text: Hi Keith James,     Please provide your order number and take a side photo of the brake pedal installation so I can check for any installation issues. Also, you can try updating the firmware again, making sure you are using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2.     ProX / ProX Ultra Pedal Firmware Update Procedure:    Press and hold the Upgrade button on the control box;    Reconnect the USB cable;    The software will indicate that the device has entered “Simsonn Flasher mode”;    In the software, go to: Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals → firmware → pedals-proxultra.sfu (If it’s a ProX pedal, select pedals-prox.sfu)    Start the firmware update, and once it is complete, release the Upgrade button;    Finally, retest and calibrate the pedals.

After update and upgrade.. brake pedal still reading only 100%


On Mon, Nov 24, 2025 at 12:16 AM service@simsonn.com

After re- calibration. Brake pedal still stuck at 100% without touching
pedal. Bad pedal? Bad control box?
Hi Keith James,  Could you please install the Todesk tool? Please provide the ID and temporary verification code, so I can check the issue remotely.       https://www.todesk.com/download.html
